mapper.insert:
select question_seq.nextval from dual
insert into question (qsNum,usrNum,qsEmail,qsName,qsPhone,qsTitle) values (#{qsNum},#{usrNum}, #{qsEmail},#{qsName},#{qsPhone},#{qsTitle})
mapper.select: select ntNum, ntUsrClassification,ntTitle,ntDate,ntContent,readcnt from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(notice)*/ rownum rn, n.ntNum, n.ntUsrClassification, n.ntTitle, n.ntDate, nc.ntContent,readcnt from notice n, noticeContent nc where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and n.ntNum = nc.ntNum ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.update: update notice set readCnt = readCnt+1 where ntNum = #{ntNum}
